greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Row sums in A082259.
mathematica: Do[s = t = 0; i = 1; While[t < n, If[Plus @@ IntegerDigits[i*n] == n, t++; s += i*n]; i++ ]; Print[s], {n, 1, 50}] (* _Ryan Propper_, Jul 16 2005 *)
results.author: _Amarnath Murthy_, Apr 12 2003
ext: Corrected and extended by _Ryan Propper_, Jul 16 2005
